languages.text: "Брешь в сердце. Брешь в горле. Брешь в животе. Раны нанесены угодным Ему образом, кровь смоет позор предательства, и души отступников смогут пасть к подножию трона Неумирающего, чтобы молить о прощении". {n}Коротким движением Кибелла стряхивает кровь с клинка.{/n} "Я доказала свою верность. И выказала почтение. Готов{mf||а} ли ты принять меня, Домин'{name}? Сделать своей тенью и щитом?"

"A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"
languages.original_text: "Брешь в сердце. Брешь в горле. Брешь в животе. Раны нанесены угодным Ему образом, кровь смоет позор предательства, и души отступников смогут пасть к подножию трона Неумирающего, чтобы молить о прощении". {n}Коротким движением Кибелла стряхивает кровь с клинка.{/n} "Я доказала свою верность. И выказала почтение. Готов{mf||а} ли ты принять меня, Домин'{name}? Сделать своей тенью и щитом?"

traits.locale_text: "A breach in the heart. A breach in the throat. A breach in the belly. The wounds were inflicted after the fashion that pleases Him. The blood will wash away the shame of treachery, so that apostates' souls may prostrate themselves at the foot of the Undying One's throne and beg for forgiveness." {n}With a quick movement, Kibellah shakes the blood off her blade.{/n} "I have proven my loyalty. And I have shown my reverence. Will you accept me, Enim'{name}? Will you make me your shadow and your shield?"

And I have shown my reverence. Will you accept me, Enim'{name}? Will you make me your shadow and your shield?"

Will you accept me, Enim'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

languages.text: « Un coup au cœur. Un coup à la gorge. Un coup au ventre. Ces blessures ont été infligées selon Son bon plaisir. Le sang des apostats lavera leur trahison, afin que leurs âmes puissent se prosterner devant le trône de l'Immortel et implorer Son pardon. » {n}Kibellah essuie le sang de sa lame d'un geste sec.{/n} « J'ai agi avec respect et prouvé ma loyauté. M'accepterez-vous, Domin'{name} ? Ferez-vous de moi votre bouclier et votre ombre ? »
languages.original_text: "A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

traits.locale_text: « Un coup au cœur. Un coup à la gorge. Un coup au ventre. Ces blessures ont été infligées selon Son bon plaisir. Le sang des apostats lavera leur trahison, afin que leurs âmes puissent se prosterner devant le trône de l'Immortel et implorer Son pardon. » {n}Kibellah essuie le sang de sa lame d'un geste sec.{/n} « J'ai agi avec respect et prouvé ma loyauté. M'accepterez-vous, Domin'{name} ? Ferez-vous de moi votre bouclier et votre ombre ? »

languages.text: «Un corte al corazón. Un corte a la garganta. Un corte al estómago. Estas son las heridas infligidas para complacerle. La sangre de los apóstatas limpiará la mácula de su traición para que sus almas puedan arrodillarse ante el trono del Inmortal y suplicar Su perdón». {n}Kibellah limpia la sangre de su daga con un rápido movimiento.{/n} «He actuado con reverencia y demostrado mi lealtad. ¿Me aceptará, Domin'{name}? ¿Me convertirá en su escudo y su sombra?».
languages.original_text: "A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

traits.locale_text: «Un corte al corazón. Un corte a la garganta. Un corte al estómago. Estas son las heridas infligidas para complacerle. La sangre de los apóstatas limpiará la mácula de su traición para que sus almas puedan arrodillarse ante el trono del Inmortal y suplicar Su perdón». {n}Kibellah limpia la sangre de su daga con un rápido movimiento.{/n} «He actuado con reverencia y demostrado mi lealtad. ¿Me aceptará, Domin'{name}? ¿Me convertirá en su escudo y su sombra?».

languages.text: “一刀破胃，一刀封喉，一刀穿心。这些伤口都是源自不死之神的意愿，叛教者的鲜血将会洗刷他们背叛的污点。这样一来，他们的灵魂就可以伏在不死之神的王座前，乞求祂的宽恕。”{n}绮贝菈“唰”地一下，擦掉了刀刃上的血迹。{/n}“我展现了尊敬的态度，证明了我的忠诚。你愿意接纳我吗，秘者{name}？你愿意让我成为你的盾牌、你的影子吗？”
languages.original_text: "A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

traits.locale_text: “一刀破胃，一刀封喉，一刀穿心。这些伤口都是源自不死之神的意愿，叛教者的鲜血将会洗刷他们背叛的污点。这样一来，他们的灵魂就可以伏在不死之神的王座前，乞求祂的宽恕。”{n}绮贝菈“唰”地一下，擦掉了刀刃上的血迹。{/n}“我展现了尊敬的态度，证明了我的忠诚。你愿意接纳我吗，秘者{name}？你愿意让我成为你的盾牌、你的影子吗？”

languages.text: 「心臓に切り傷、喉に切り傷、胃に切り傷。これらの傷は、主の為に作られたもの。背教者たちの血は、彼らの裏切りの汚れを洗い流し、彼らの魂は不滅の御座の前にひれ伏し、御赦しを請うだろう。」{n}キベラは素早い動きで、刃から血をふき取った。{/n}「私は敬意をもって行動し、忠誠の証を示してきました。私を受け入れてくれますか、ドミン・{name}？ 私をあなたの盾にし、影にしてくれますか？」
languages.original_text: "A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

traits.locale_text: 「心臓に切り傷、喉に切り傷、胃に切り傷。これらの傷は、主の為に作られたもの。背教者たちの血は、彼らの裏切りの汚れを洗い流し、彼らの魂は不滅の御座の前にひれ伏し、御赦しを請うだろう。」{n}キベラは素早い動きで、刃から血をふき取った。{/n}「私は敬意をもって行動し、忠誠の証を示してきました。私を受け入れてくれますか、エニム？{name}私をあなたの盾にし、影にしてくれますか？」

languages.text: "Ein Schnitt ins Herz. Ein Schnitt in die Kehle. Ein Schnitt in den Magen. Diese Wunden wurden dem Wunsch des Todlosen gemäß verursacht. Das Blut der Apostaten wird den Makel ihres Verrats fortwaschen, auf dass ihre Seelen sich vor dem Thron des Todlosen niederwerfen und ihn um Vergebung bitten können." {n}Kibellah wischt mit einer schnellen Bewegung das Blut von ihrer Klinge.{/n} "Ich habe mit Ehrfurcht gehandelt und den Beweis meiner Loyalität erbracht. Werdet Ihr mich akzeptieren, Domin'{name}? Macht Ihr mich zu Eurem Schild und Eurem Schatten?"
languages.original_text: "A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Schnitt ins Herz. Ein Schnitt in die Kehle. Ein Schnitt in den Magen. Diese Wunden wurden dem Wunsch des Todlosen gemäß verursacht. Das Blut der Apostaten wird den Makel ihres Verrats fortwaschen, auf dass ihre Seelen sich vor dem Thron des Todlosen niederwerfen und ihn um Vergebung bitten können." {n}Kibellah wischt mit einer schnellen Bewegung das Blut von ihrer Klinge.{/n} "Ich habe mit Ehrfurcht gehandelt und den Beweis meiner Loyalität erbracht. Werdet Ihr mich akzeptieren, Domin'{name}? Macht Ihr mich zu Eurem Schild und Eurem Schatten?"

languages.text: "Kalbimde, boğazıma ve midemde birer kesik var... Bu yaralar, O'nun memnuniyeti için açıldı. Döneklerin kanı, ihanetlerinin lekesini temizleyecek. Böylece ruhları, Ölmeyen'in tahtı önünde yerlere kapanıp O'nun affı için yalvarabilecek." {n}Kibellah, tek bir seri hareketle kılıcının üzerindeki kanı temizliyor.{/n} "Hürmetle hareket ettim ve sadakatimi kanıtladım. Beni kabul edecek misin Domin'{name}? Beni kalkanın ve gölgen yapacak mısın?"
languages.original_text: "A cut to the heart. A cut to the throat. A cut to the stomach. These wounds have been inflicted according to His pleasure. The blood of the apostates will wash away the stain of their treachery, so that their souls may prostrate themselves before the Undying One's throne and beg His forgiveness." {n}Kibellah wipes the blood from her blade in one swift movement.{/n} "I have acted with reverence and shown proof of my loyalty. Will you accept me, Domin'{name}? Will you make me your shield and shadow?"
